actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of yesterday, the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of yesterday, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

S. 316 (Sen. Kaine):
        A bill to repeal the authorizations for use of military force against Iraq.

        -- Cloture on the motion to proceed to the measure invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 27. Record Vote Number: 61 


        -- Motion to proceed to measure considered in Senate.

PN85:
        Jessica G. L. Clarke, of New York, to be United States District Judge for the Southern District of New York

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 60 


        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 43. Record Vote Number: 62
By unanimous consent, on the request of Ms. Cantwell, at 3:34 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until  8:45 a.m. tomorrow.
